definition: to advance singing loudly (idiom); triumphant progress
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Mothers-in-law improve the rising housing price.
sentences.chinese: 丈母孃鞭促房價高歌猛進。

sentences.english: Advances in medicine have raced ahead, but far too many people have been left behind.
sentences.chinese: 醫學進步在高歌猛進，但太多的人被拋在後面。
